Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Umineko Project (UP): "......Mother was always trying something new. But it was very educational being able to study their various merits."
Steam (ST): ...Mom was pretty fickle. But I've learned from studying various merits."
PC Japanese (JP): ……母さんが色々と移り気でね。でも色々と特長を学べて勉強になったよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……母さんが色々と移り気でね。でも色々と特長を学べて勉強になったよ」
Russian (RU): ".......Мама была довольно непостоянной. Но я выучился, изучая разные достоинства."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Minha mãe sempre estava tentando me ensinar algo novo. Mas também era muito educacional poder estudar seus vários méritos."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……我媽媽一會兒這一會兒那，沒個常性。不過，這倒是使我學到了各種功夫的長處，很是受用。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……我妈妈一会儿这一会儿那，没个常性。不过，这倒是使我学到了各种功夫的长处，很是受用。」

Speaker: Gaap
Umineko Project (UP): "Wh‐......why don't you hit......? ......Because I'm a woman?!!"
Steam (ST): "...Wh-Why don't you hit me...? ...You aren't going to say it's because I'm a woman, right?!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「な、……なぜ当てない……？……私が女だからだとでも言うのかッ！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「な、……なぜ当てない……？　……私が女だからだとでも言うのかッ！！」
Russian (RU): "П‐почему ты не наносишь удар? .......Уж не хочешь ли ты заявить, будто потому, что я женщина, а?!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "P‐......Por que você não atinge......? ......Por que eu sou uma mulher?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「為、……為什麼就是不踢中……？……難道要說，因為我是女人嗎！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「为、……为什么就是不踢中……？……难道要说，因为我是女人吗！！」

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Umineko Project (UP): "......You spoke of force as a monarch's third power."
Steam (ST): "...You spoke of force as a monarch's third power.
PC Japanese (JP): 「……君は、王者の力として３つ目に暴力と言ったね。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……君は、王者の力として３つ目に暴力と言ったね」
Russian (RU): ".......Ты упоминала могущество монарха как третий вид силы."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Você falou da força como sendo o terceiro poder de um monarca."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……你說了，王者之力中的第三個乃是暴力。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……你说了，王者之力中的第三个乃是暴力。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Umineko Project (UP): "It looks like you're still mistaking the meaning of that force. ......In this situation, force doesn't mean hastily wielded violence. .........It refers to a deterrent—the knowledge that if someone opposes the monarch, that person won't get away unharmed."
Steam (ST): It looks like you still misunderstand the meaning of that force. ...In this situation, force doesn't mean hastily wielded violence. ......It refers to a deterrent, knowledge that if someone opposes the monarch, that person won't get away unharmed."
PC Japanese (JP): 君はどうやらまだ、その暴力の意味を誤解しているようだ。……この場合の暴力とはね、短絡的に振るわれる乱暴のことを言うんじゃない。………敵対すれば、無傷では済まないという、抑止のことを指すんだよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「君はどうやらまだ、その暴力の意味を誤解しているようだ。……この場合の暴力とはね、短絡的に振るわれる乱暴のことを言うんじゃない。………敵対すれば、無傷では済まないという、抑止のことを指すんだよ」
Russian (RU): "Однако ты, похоже, заблуждаешься насчёт значения этой силы. ......В данной ситуации сила означает не поспешное применение насилия. .......Она подразумевает сдерживание... Осознание, что если кто‐либо воспротивится монарху, то ему не уйти невредимым."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Parece que você ainda está confundindo o significado de força. ......Em uma situação como essa, força não significa uma violência precipitada e dominadora. .........Refere‐se a ser dissuasivo — o conhecimento de que, se alguém se opõem a um monarca, essa pessoa não vai sair ilesa."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「看來你還是對這個“暴力”的意義有誤解呢。……在這一情況下所說的“暴力”，並不是指武斷地胡亂施暴。………而是指，“若要敵對，就無法全身而退”的，抑制。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「看来你还是对这个“暴力”的意义有误解呢。……在这一情况下所说的“暴力”，并不是指武断地胡乱施暴。………而是指，“若要敌对，就无法全身而退”的，抑制。」

Speaker: Gaap
Umineko Project (UP): "A deterrent......?"
Steam (ST): "A deterrent, ...you say...?"
Russian (RU): "Сдерживание... говоришь..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Dissuasivo......?"
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Umineko Project (UP): That was the point. That was why all of George's attacks up until then had stopped just before the blow.
Steam (ST): In short, this is what it meant. This was why all of George's attacks up until then had stopped a hair's breadth away.
PC Japanese (JP): つまりはそういうこと。これまでの譲治の攻撃が全て寸止めなのは、そういうことなのだ。
Russian (RU): Вот оно. Вот почему удары Джорджа останавливались в нескольких миллиметрах от цели.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É o que significa. É por isso que todos os ataques de George até então pararam pouco antes do impacto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此話就代表著。之前讓治所有攻擊皆止于寸止，全都是為了此。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此话就代表着。之前让治所有攻击皆止于寸止，全都是为了此。

Umineko Project (UP): These bare misses, which were more difficult than hitting directly, had all been performed so splendidly.
Steam (ST): These bare misses, which were more difficult than hitting directly, had all been performed so splendidly.
PC Japanese (JP): 直撃させるよりも困難とされる寸止めを、これほどまでに華麗に披露した。
Russian (RU): Все эти почти‐промахи, превосходящие по сложности выполнения контактные удары, были выполнены идеальным образом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Esses mínimos erros, os quais são muito mais difíceis do que um ataque direto, foram todos performados de forma esplêndida.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他華麗地披露了這麼多下比直接命中要困難得多的寸止。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他华丽地披露了这么多下比直接命中要困难得多的寸止。

Umineko Project (UP): ...And any one of them would probably have crushed Gaap in a single hit, if George had wished it.
Steam (ST): ...Also, if George had wished it, any one of those would probably have crushed Gaap.

Chinese Simplified (CN): …并且，不管哪下都是，只要让治想，就能一击击败噶普的吧。

Steam (ST): He had, daringly, not done that.
PC Japanese (JP): それを、敢えて、やらない。

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他是，故意，不這麼做。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他是，故意，不这么做。

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Umineko Project (UP): "You said it yourself, right? Force is the power to rule. .........If you destroy your opponent with force, you won't be able to rule them, right?"
Steam (ST): "You said it yourself, right? Force is the power to control. ......If you crush your opponent with force, you won't be able control them, right?
PC Japanese (JP): 「君も言ったろ？　暴力は統べる力だと。………暴力で相手を破壊してしまったら、統べられないじゃないか。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「君も言ったろ？　暴力は統べる力だと。………暴力で相手を破壊してしまったら、統べられないじゃないか」
Russian (RU): "Ты ведь сама сказала, верно? Сила — это могущество управлять другими. ........Сокрушив врага силой, ты не сможешь управлять ими, верно?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você mesmo disse, certo? Força é o poder para governar. .........Se destruir seu oponente com força, não será capaz de governá‐lo, certo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「你也有說過吧？暴力是統御之力。………若是用暴力把對方轟殺了，那不就沒法統御了嘛。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「你也有说过吧？暴力是统御之力。………若是用暴力把对方轰杀了，那不就没法统御了嘛。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Umineko Project (UP): "A monarch's force is something that is only shown. He does not destroy. ......He makes others submit, and adds them to his own fortune. If you black out on me, I won't be able to make you guide me to where everyone is being held."
Steam (ST): A monarch's force is something that is only shown. He does not crush. He makes others surrender and adds them to his own fortune." "If you start blowing bubbles, I won't be able to make you guide me to where the hostages are."
PC Japanese (JP): 王者の暴力とはね、見せるだけなんだよ。破壊しない。……屈服させて、自らの財産とするんだからね。君に泡でも吹かれたら、みんなの捕らわれてる場所に案内させられないよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「王者の暴力とはね、見せるだけなんだよ。破壊しない。……屈服させて、自らの財産とするんだからね。君に泡でも吹かれたら、みんなの捕らわれてる場所に案内させられないよ」
Russian (RU): "Сила монарха заключается только в демонстрации. Он не сокрушает, а заставляет других капитулировать и прибавляет их состояние к своему. А если я отделаю тебя до потери сознания, ты не сможешь отвести меня к месту заточения остальных."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "A força de um monarca é algo apenas para ser exibido. Ele não destrói.{n}......Ele faz com que os outros se submetam, e os adiciona à sua fortuna. Se você começar a soprar bolhas em mim, eu não serei capaz de fazer você me guiar até onde todos estão."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「王者的暴力，只做展示。不做破壞。……因為，王者要令人屈服，使其成為自己的財產。你要是被揍得口吐白沫，那就沒法領我去關押大家的地方了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「王者的暴力，只做展示。不做破坏。……因为，王者要令人屈服，使其成为自己的财产。你要是被揍得口吐白沫，那就没法领我去关押大家的地方了。」

Umineko Project (UP): Gaap had to admit it.
Steam (ST): Gaap had to admit it.
PC Japanese (JP): ガァプは認めざるを得ない。
Russian (RU): Гаап оказалась вынуждена признать это.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Gaap teve que admitir.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 噶普不得不承認。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 噶普不得不承认。

Umineko Project (UP): She had to admit that George understood force in the truest sense...!
Steam (ST): She had to admit that George understood force in its truest sense...!
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治が完璧な意味で、暴力を理解していることを認めざるを得ない…！
Russian (RU): Ей пришлось признать, что Джордж понимал истинный смысл силы и могущества.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela teve que admitir que George entendia sua força no mais verdadeiro sentido...!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她不得不承認，讓治完美無缺地理解了暴力…！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她不得不承认，让治完美无缺地理解了暴力…！

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Umineko Project (UP): "You'll take me to where everyone is. I would advise against resisting. .........I won't hold back anymore."
Steam (ST): "You'll take me to where everyone is. I would advise against resisting. ...I won't stop short next time."
PC Japanese (JP): 「みんなのところへ案内してもらうよ。抵抗はお奨めしない。………もう寸止めはしないよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「みんなのところへ案内してもらうよ。抵抗はお奨めしない。………もう寸止めはしないよ」
Russian (RU): "Ты отведёшь меня к узникам. Настоятельно рекомендую не сопротивляться. В следующий раз я не промахнусь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você vai me levar até onde todos estão. Eu recomendo que evite resistir.{n}.........Eu não irei mais me conter."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「帶我去大家所在之處吧。我不建議你反抗。………不會再有寸止。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「带我去大家所在之处吧。我不建议你反抗。………不会再有寸止。」

Speaker: Gaap
Umineko Project (UP): "...khh...!! .........Sorry, Lia... Lemme borrow your troops. This guy's too much for me alone to handle!!"
Steam (ST): "...Ack!! ......Sorry, Lia. Lemme borrow your troops. This guy's too much for me alone to handle!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「…くッ！！………ごめんねリーア、あんたの兵隊、借りさせて。私ひとりじゃ手に負えないわ、こいつッ！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…くッ！！　………ごめんねリーア、あんたの兵隊、借りさせて。私ひとりじゃ手に負えないわ、こいつッ！！」
Russian (RU): "Ой! ..........Извини, Лия, позволь‐ка мне позаимствовать твоих солдат. У меня не хватает рук на этого парня!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...khh...!! .........Desculpa, Lia... Empreste‐me suas tropas. Essa cara é forte demais para eu lidar sozinha!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…咕！！………對不起了莉～亞，借你的士卒一用。我一個人罩不住這小子！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…咕！！………对不起了莉～亚，借你的士卒一用。我一个人罩不住这小子！！」

Umineko Project (UP): As a large, pitch‐black hole opened in the sky, thunk, thunk, thunk—three muscular goat attendants fell out. They surrounded George.
Steam (ST): As a large, pitch-black hole opened in the sky, *thunk* *thunk* *thunk*, three muscular goat attendants fell out. They surrounded George.
PC Japanese (JP): 空中に大きな漆黒の穴を開くと、ドン、ズン、ドスンと、３人の屈強な山羊の従者が落ちてくる。それらは譲治を囲んでいた。
Russian (RU): В небе открылась крупная, чёрная как смоль дыра и *бух* *бух* *бух*, трое мускулистых козлоголовых слуг выпали из неё. Они окружили Джорджа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Um grande e negro buraco se abriu no céu, baam, baam, baam — três musculosos serventes‐cabra caíram do céu. Eles cercaram George.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從空中展開了一個巨大的漆黑的洞，嗵、咚、撲嗵，三名魁梧的山羊侍從掉了下來。他們將讓治圍在了中間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从空中展开了一个巨大的漆黑的洞，嗵、咚、扑嗵，三名魁梧的山羊侍从掉了下来。他们将让治围在了中间。

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Reinforcements? I wonder if I should take this to mean that you retract your statement about me being weak."
Steam (ST): "......Reinforcements? Should I take this to mean that you take back all that about me being weak?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………増援かい？　それは僕がひ弱であることを撤回したと受け止めていいのかな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………増援かい？　それは僕がひ弱であることを撤回したと受け止めていいのかな」
Russian (RU): "........Подкрепление? Меня больше не считают слабаком, надо полагать."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Reforços? Pergunto‐me se eu deveria assumir como sendo um recuo sobre sua afirmação de que eu era fraco."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………增援麼？我可以把這理解為，你撤回了說我“弱不禁風”的發言嗎？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………增援么？我可以把这理解为，你撤回了说我“弱不禁风”的发言吗？」

Speaker: Gaap
Umineko Project (UP): "I, ......I admit it. ......I made light of your power...the power of {y:0:Human}{n:0:human}s......"
Steam (ST): "...I-I admit it. ...I made light of your...Human power..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「み、……認めるわ。……あんたの、…ニンゲンの力を侮ってたわ……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「み、……認めるわ。……あんたの、…ニンゲンの力を侮ってたわ……」
Russian (RU): "Я... вынуждена признать, что недооценила твою силу как {y:0:Челове}{n:0:челове}ка."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu, ......eu admito. ......Eu subestimei seu poder...o poder de um {y:0:Humano}{n:0:humano}......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……我承認。……太小看你的力量、…人類的力量了……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……我承认。……太小看你的力量、…人类的力量了……」

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Umineko Project (UP): "No. This is the strength of a man who has come to know love."
Steam (ST): "That's wrong. This is the strength of a man who's experienced love."
PC Japanese (JP): 「違うね。これが、愛を覚えた男の強さなのさ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「違うね。これが、愛を覚えた男の強さなのさ」
Russian (RU): "Ты ошибаешься. Это не просто сила человека, но сила человека, познавшего любовь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não. Esta é a força de um homem que conheceu o amor."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「錯了。這是，懂得了愛的男人的強大。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「错了。这是，懂得了爱的男人的强大。」

Speaker: Gaap
Umineko Project (UP): "Wh‐what tripe... How can you say stuff like that with a straight face?!! Come, goats! Crush this man into meatballs!"
Steam (ST): "H-How can you say stuff like that with a straight face?!! Come, goats! Crush this man and turn him into meatballs!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ほ、ほざけ…、臭いことをしゃあしゃあとッ！！　さぁ、山羊たち！　その男を潰して肉団子にしてやりなさい！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ほ、ほざけ…、臭いことをしゃあしゃあとッ！！　さぁ、山羊たち！　その男を潰して肉団子にしてやりなさい！」
Russian (RU): "Как ты можешь говорить подобные вещи с невозмутимым лицом?! Вперёд, козлоголовые! Изрубите этого человечишку в котлеты!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Q‐Quanta bobagem... Como você pode dizer algo assim com uma expressão tão direta em seu rosto?! Vamos, cabras! Transformem este homem em almôndegas!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「少、少狂…，臉皮三尺厚地盡講些肉麻話！！來，山羊們！把這男人壓成肉丸！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「少、少狂…，脸皮三尺厚地尽讲些肉麻话！！来，山羊们！把这男人压成肉丸！」

Speaker: Gaap
Umineko Project (UP): "Heheheh, these goats are stupid, but it looks like they at least have power. I'll make it so that even your fiancée won't be able to recognize your corpse!"
Steam (ST): "*giggle* These goats are stupid, but it looks like they at least have power. I'll turn you into a corpse that even your fiancée won't be able to recognize!"
PC Japanese (JP): くすくす、この山羊たちは馬鹿だけど、パワーだけはあるみたいよ。あんたの死体、婚約者にも見分けがつかなくしてあげるわ！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「くすくす、この山羊たちは馬鹿だけど、パワーだけはあるみたいよ。あんたの死体、婚約者にも見分けがつかなくしてあげるわ！」
Russian (RU): "*хи‐хи*, эти козлоголовые с виду ещё те болваны, но зато хотя бы имеют силу. Я позабочусь, чтобы даже твоя невеста не смогла опознать твой труп!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Heheheh, essas cabras são idiotas, mas parece que ao menos são fortes. Farei questão de deixá‐lo em um estado que nem sua noiva reconheça seu cadáver!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「呵呵，雖然這幾個山羊挺笨的，但力氣好像並不小哦。把你的屍體揍到爛到連你未婚妻都認不出來！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呵呵，虽然这几个山羊挺笨的，但力气好像并不小哦。把你的尸体揍到烂到连你未婚妻都认不出来！」

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Umineko Project (UP): "You refuse to surrender and intend to continue fighting. Understood. ......I proclaim that henceforth, you will receive real harm proportional to your own attacks."
Steam (ST): "You refuse to surrender and intend to continue fighting. Understood. ...Know that from now on, you will receive real harm proportional to your own attacks."
PC Japanese (JP): 「降伏拒否、並びに継戦の意思、了解したよ。……以後は、君の攻撃に等しい分だけ、君に実害が及ぶことを宣言する。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「降伏拒否、並びに継戦の意思、了解したよ。……以後は、君の攻撃に等しい分だけ、君に実害が及ぶことを宣言する」
Russian (RU): "Ты отказываешься сдаться и намереваешься продолжать драку. ......Я заявляю, что отныне ты получишь урон, прямопропорциональный твоим собственным атакам.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Se recusa a se render e pretende continuar lutando? Entendo. ......Eu proclamo, doravante, que você receberá uma dano real proporcional ao seus ataques."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「拒絕投降，要繼續戰下去，明白了。……我宣言，在這之後，你會受到與你的攻擊同等的實際損傷。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「拒绝投降，要继续战下去，明白了。……我宣言，在这之后，你会受到与你的攻击同等的实际损伤。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Umineko Project (UP): "If you still plan on attacking me, I suggest you prepare to receive a great deal of damage."
Steam (ST): "If you still plan on attacking me, prepare to sustain a great deal of damage."
PC Japanese (JP): 僕をまだ攻撃するつもりなら、相応の損害を受けることになると、覚悟するがいいよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「僕をまだ攻撃するつもりなら、相応の損害を受けることになると、覚悟するがいいよ」
Russian (RU): "Если ты всё ещё не отказалась от намерений убить меня, то готовься к крайне болезненной взбучке."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Se você ainda planeja me atacar, eu sugiro que esteja preparada para receber um grande dano também."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「你若是還想攻擊我的話，那就去做好會受到相應損傷的思想準備吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「你若是还想攻击我的话，那就去做好会受到相应损伤的思想准备吧。」

Umineko Project (UP): When George proclaimed that, ......a faint red magic circle rose up around him.
Steam (ST): When George proclaimed that, ...a faint, red magic circle rose up around him.
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治がそれを宣言した時、……譲治の回りに、薄っすらと赤い魔法陣が浮かび上がる。
Russian (RU): Когда Джордж объявил это, то вокруг него возник едва различимый красный круг, который затем поднялся вверх.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando George proclamou aquilo, ......um tênue círculo mágico vermelho se ergueu ao seu redor.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在讓治如此宣言的同時，……讓治的四周，浮現出了淡淡的紅色魔法陣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在让治如此宣言的同时，……让治的四周，浮现出了淡淡的红色魔法阵。

Umineko Project (UP): But it seemed that George couldn't see it.{n}However, Gaap, being a demon, could.
Steam (ST): It seemed that George couldn't see it. However, Gaap, being a demon, could.
PC Japanese (JP): しかしそれは譲治には見えていないらしい。しかし悪魔であるガァプには見えた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかしそれは譲治には見えていないらしい。{n}しかし悪魔であるガァプには見えた。
Russian (RU): Джордж, судя по всему, его не видел.{n}А вот Гаап, будучи демоном, прекрасно его видела.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas parecia que George não conseguia ver.{n}Entretanto, por ser um demônio, Gaap podia ver.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，讓治好像並沒有看到。{n}不過，身為惡魔的噶普看在眼裡。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，让治好像并没有看到。{n}不过，身为恶魔的噶普看在眼里。

Speaker: Gaap
Umineko Project (UP): "M‐......magic?! Why does this guy have a defensive barrier...?! And what's more, it's......specialized for counterattacks...?! Is this......wh‐what you meant by a deterrent......?!"
Steam (ST): "...M-Magic?! Why does this guy have a defensive barrier...?! And that's also...a counterattacking type...?! Is this...wh-what you meant by a deterrent...?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ま、……魔法？！　どうしてこいつが防御結界を…？！　しかもそれ、……反撃特化…ッ？！それが、……あ、あんたの抑止という意味ッ……？！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ま、……魔法？！　どうしてこいつが防御結界を…？！　しかもそれ、……反撃特化…ッ？！　それが、……あ、あんたの抑止という意味ッ……？！」
Russian (RU): "М‐магия?! Откуда у этого парня взялся защитный барьер?! Да ещё и настроенный на контратаки?! Так вот что ты... имел в виду под устрашением?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ma‐......Magia?! Por que esse cara tem uma barreira defensiva...?! E mais do que isso, é......especializada para contra‐ataques...?! É isto......o‐o que você se quer dizer com ser dissuasivo......?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「魔、……魔法？！為什麼這小子有防御結界…？！而且這還是，……反擊特化…？！這就是，……你、你所說的抑制的意義嗎……？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「魔、……魔法？！为什么这小子有防御结界…？！而且这还是，……反击特化…？！这就是，……你、你所说的抑制的意义吗……？！」

Umineko Project (UP): From a demon's perspective, that might have been magic.
Steam (ST): From a demon's perspective, that may have been magic.
PC Japanese (JP): 悪魔たちから見れば、そういう魔法だったかもしれない。
Russian (RU): С точки зрения Гаап этот барьер вполне являлся магией.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Para a perspectiva de um demônio, aquilo poderia ser magia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在惡魔們眼中，也許它就是這麼一種魔法吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在恶魔们眼中，也许它就是这么一种魔法吧。

Umineko Project (UP): But in George's eyes, it was...determination.
Steam (ST): But in George's eyes, it was...determination.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし譲治にしてみればそれは、決意。
Russian (RU): Однако в восприятии Джорджа это была твёрдая решимость.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas aos olhos de George, aquilo era...determinação.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過在讓治眼中，它乃是，決意。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过在让治眼中，它乃是，决意。

Umineko Project (UP): It was absolute determination that would show no mercy to anyone who wished for further fighting, and force them to prepare for a significant counterattack.
Steam (ST): It was a determination filled with certainty, ...which would be merciless to anyone who wished to fight anymore... and which would force them to prepare for a significant counterattack.
PC Japanese (JP): これ以上の戦いを望むならば、誰であろうとも容赦しない、そして相応の反撃を覚悟してもらうという絶対の決意。
Russian (RU): Решимость, готовая проявить беспощадность к любому, желающему продолжать сражаться и вынудить их готовиться к серьёзной контратаке.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era uma determinação absoluta, que não demonstraria piedade com aqueles que desejassem continuar a lutar, e iria forçá‐los a se prepararem para um significante contra‐ataque.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此乃以示“若要繼續戰下去，那就不管對誰都不會留情，要來，就等著挨相應的反擊吧”的絕對的決意。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此乃以示“若要继续战下去，那就不管对谁都不会留情，要来，就等着挨相应的反击吧”的绝对的决意。

Umineko Project (UP): Absolute determination...becomes magic.
Steam (ST): Determination with certainty...becomes magic.
PC Japanese (JP): 絶対の決意が、魔法になる。
Russian (RU): Решимость, обретающая твёрдость... Становится магией.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Determinação absoluta...se torna magia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 絕對的決意，化為了魔法。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绝对的决意，化为了魔法。

Umineko Project (UP): Ronove had been accurately blocking Jessica's fists with the shield. ......But something felt odd.
Steam (ST): Ronove had been accurately blocking Jessica's fists with his shield. ...But something felt odd.
PC Japanese (JP): ロノウェは的確に、シールドで朱志香の鉄拳を防いでいた。……しかし、違和感。
Russian (RU): Ронове с филигранной точностью блокировал удары кулаков Джессики своим щитом. ......Но тут он ощутил какую‐то неправильность.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ronove estava bloqueando precisamente os socos de Jessica com seu escudo. ......Mas algo estava estranho.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 羅諾威的的確確地以護盾防住了朱志香的鐵拳。……可是，不對勁。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 罗诺威的的确确地以护盾防住了朱志香的铁拳。……可是，不对劲。

Umineko Project (UP): Even though he was certainly stopping the blows with the shield, he felt his arm beginning to strain and ache.
Steam (ST): Even though he was certainly catching them on the shield, he felt his arm get jarred, and it hurt.
PC Japanese (JP): 確実にシールドで受け止めているはずなのに、腕が軋み、痛むのを感じる。
Russian (RU): Да, щит принимал и гасил удары, однако его рука вдруг стала дрожать и болеть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo que ele, de fato, estivesse bloqueando os golpes com o escudo, ele podia sentir seu braço ficando tensionado e dolorido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 明明扎扎實實地以護盾接住了攻擊，但手臂卻在發麻、發痛。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 明明扎扎实实地以护盾接住了攻击，但手臂却在发麻、发痛。

Umineko Project (UP): All physical damage should have been shut off.
Steam (ST): It should have prevented all physical damage.
PC Japanese (JP): 物理ダメージは断絶されているはず。
Russian (RU): Физическому урону полагалось пресекаться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Todo dano físico deveria ser contido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 物理上的攻擊，理應是被徹底隔絕了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 物理上的攻击，理应是被彻底隔绝了。

Umineko Project (UP): ......However, the damage from her fists was gradually being transmitted to his arm, and was accumulating.
Steam (ST): ...However, the damage from her fists was gradually being transmitted to his arm, piling up.
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかし、鉄拳のダメージがわずかずつ腕に伝わり、蓄積しているのだ。
Russian (RU): Однако урон от её кулаков начал постепенно накапливаться передаваться его руке.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Entretanto, o dano dos punhos de Jessica gradualmente estava sendo transmitido para os braços de Ronove, acomulando‐se.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……可是，鐵拳的痛擊卻在一點點地傳到手臂上，積蓄起了傷痛。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……可是，铁拳的痛击却在一点点地传到手臂上，积蓄起了伤痛。

Umineko Project (UP): Ronove acted like he was composed, so that this wouldn't be noticed...
Steam (ST): Ronove tried to act like he was composed, so that this wouldn't be noticed...
PC Japanese (JP): ロノウェはそれを気取られまいと平静を装う…。
Russian (RU): Ронове держался собранным, стараясь скрыть это.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ronove agiu como se estivesse bem, por isso ela não notou...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 羅諾威為了不讓朱志香看出這點，而強裝平靜…。

Speaker: Nanjo Terumasa
Umineko Project (UP): "S‐stop it, it's impossible, Krauss‐san! We can't do anything about them with our bare hands! Let's look for a tool, don't waste time on the impossible...!"
Steam (ST): "S-Stop it, it's impossible, Krauss-san! There's nothing we can do with our bare hands! Let's look for a tool, don't waste time on the impossible...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「よ、よせ、無茶だ、蔵臼さん！　素手でどうにかなるもんじゃない！道具を探しましょう、無茶をするんじゃない…！」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "P‐Pare, é impossível, Krauss‐san! Não podemos fazer nada quanto a isso de mãos vazias! Vamos procurar por alguma ferramenta, não perca seu tempo com o impossível...!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「好、好了，没用的，藏臼！这不是空手就能解决的！去找找工具吧，别胡来…！」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Umineko Project (UP): "If you give up saying it's useless, then it's all over...that's what my daughter said. ......Even if it's impossible for my body, as long as a small person like Shannon or Kanon could make it through......!!"

PC Japanese (JP): 「無駄と諦めたらそれまでと、娘に言われてしまった。……私の体は無理でも、小柄な紗音か嘉音が抜けられれば……！！」
Russian (RU): "Если опускать руки, поскольку считаешь что‐то напрасным, то тогда конец всему... Вот что сказала моя дочь. ......Даже если моему телу не под силу преодолеть эту решётку, то если удастся протиснуться кому‐нибудь с более скромным телосложением, вроде Шаннон или Канона!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Se você desistir dizendo que é inútil, então está tudo acabado...foi o que a minha filha disse. ......Mesmo que seja impossível para o meu corpo passar, uma pessoa pequena como a Shannon ou o Kanon conseguira......!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我女兒說了，覺得白費勁而放棄，那就到此結束了。……雖然我的個子沒戲，但只要能讓小個子的嘉音紗音鑽出去……！！」

Umineko Project (UP): "......At this stage, action is more important than racking our brains. Let's put our strength together, I'll join in too...! ......Kanon‐kun, you're a boy, lend a hand...! ......Kanon‐kun?!"
Steam (ST): "...Now that we've reached this point, action is more important than racking our brains. Let's work together, I'll do it too...! ...Kanon-kun, you're a boy, aren't you? Lend a hand...! ...Kanon-kun?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……この段階に至っては、出ない知恵を絞るより行動あるのみね。力を合わせましょ、私もやるわ…！　……嘉音くん、男の子でしょ、手を貸して…！……嘉音くん？！」

Umineko Project (UP): "Come, arise, goat attendants...! It's time for work. Kill and capture the escapees. Corpses are fine, we can just revive them anyway!"
Steam (ST): "Come, arise, goat attendants...! It's time to work. Catch and kill the escapees. Corpses are fine, we can just revive them anyway!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「さぁさ、お出でなさい、山羊の従者たち…！　お仕事の時間ですよ。脱走者たちを殺して捕らえなさい。死体でいいのですよ、どうせ蘇生できるし！」
Russian (RU): "Явитесь, предстаньте, козлоголовые приспешники! Пора работать. Поймайте и убейте беглецов. То что будут трупы — не беда, мы так и так сможем потом воскресить их!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Venham, apareçam, serventes‐cabra...! É hora de trabalharem. Matem e capturem os fugitivos. Cadáveres servem, nós só precisamos revivê‐los depois!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「來——來，出來吧，山羊侍從們…！到工作的時間了喲。把脫逃者殺了捉回來。拖屍體回來就行了，反正能復活！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「来——来，出来吧，山羊侍从们…！到工作的时间了哟。把脱逃者杀了捉回来。拖尸体回来就行了，反正能复活！」

Umineko Project (UP): A gold‐colored door opened in the air, and countless giant goats with muscular bodies peeked their faces out...
Steam (ST): A gold-colored door opened in the air...and countless giant goats with muscular bodies peeked their faces out...
PC Japanese (JP): 空間に金色の扉が開き、筋骨隆々の肉体を持つ巨漢の山羊たちが無数に顔をのぞかせる…。
Russian (RU): В воздухе отварилась золотая дверь и из неё выглянули бесчисленное количество мускулистых козлоголовых.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Uma porta de ouro se abriu no meio do ar, e incontáveis cabras gigantes com corpos musculosos colocaram suas caras para fora...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 空間中敞開了金色的門扉，無數肌肉發達身材巨大的山羊從門中探出頭來…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 空间中敞开了金色的门扉，无数肌肉发达身材巨大的山羊从门中探出头来…。

Speaker: {f:5:Virgilia}
Umineko Project (UP): "Come now, hurry. There are five escapees, so the fastest five of you win! There will be a wonderful prize! Come on now, go for it, go for it!"
Steam (ST): "Come now, hurry. There are five escapees, so the fastest five of you win! There will be a wonderful prize, so give it your all, give it your all!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「さぁさ、急ぎなさい。脱走者は５人いるから五等賞までの早い者勝ち！素敵なご褒美がありますよ、さぁさ頑張って頑張って！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「さぁさ、急ぎなさい。脱走者は５人いるから五等賞までの早い者勝ち！　素敵なご褒美がありますよ、さぁさ頑張って頑張って！」
Russian (RU): "Ну же, поторапливайтесь. Имеется пять беглецов, поэтому победит самая быстрая пятёрка из вас! Победителей ожидает чудесный приз, поэтому постарайтесь как следует и изо всех сил!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Venham, rápido. Há cinco fugitivos, então os cinco mais rápidos vencem! Haverão prêmios incríveis! Agora vão! Vamos, se esforcem por eles!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「來——來，快去吧。因為有五名脫逃者，所以這是有一到五等獎的競速賽！備有美妙的獎品哦，來——來，加油加油！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「来——来，快去吧。因为有五名脱逃者，所以这是有一到五等奖的竞速赛！备有美妙的奖品哦，来——来，加油加油！」

Umineko Project (UP): {f:5:Virgilia} clapped her hands, urging them on.
Steam (ST): {f:5:Virgilia} clapped her hands, urging them on.
PC Japanese (JP): ワルギリアは促すようにパンパン！と手を叩く。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ワルギリアは促すようにパンパン！　と手を叩く。
Russian (RU): {f:5:Вергилия} хлопнула в ладоши, подгоняя их.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {f:5:Virgilia} bateu palmas, incitando‐as.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 瓦爾基莉亞如在催促般地“啪啪！”拍了拍手。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 瓦尔基莉亚如在催促般地“啪啪！”拍了拍手。

Umineko Project (UP): A prize?! After glancing at each other at those words, the goats rushed to the door at once, trying to get out, making the exit as tight a squeeze as the trains during the commuter rush.
Steam (ST): A prize?! After facing each other at those words, the goats all rushed to the door at once, trying to get out, making the exit as packed as the Touzai or the Yamanote rail lines in the morning.
PC Japanese (JP): ご褒美？！　その言葉に顔を見合わせた後、山羊たちは一斉に扉から出ようと殺到し、その出入り口はまるで朝の山手線か東西線くらいギュウギュウになる。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ご褒美？！　その言葉に顔を見合わせた後、山羊たちは一斉に扉から出ようと殺到し、その出入り口はまるで通勤ラッシュの電車くらいギュウギュウになる。
Russian (RU): Приз?! После этих слов, козлоголовые, переглянувшись, сразу все ломанулись к выходу, образовав такой затор, какой можно увидеть по утрам на железнодорожных линиях Тоузай и Яманотэ.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Um prêmio?! Após olharem uns para os outros diante daquelas palavras, as cabras se apressaram em direção à porta, tentando sair, fazendo com que a saída ficasse apertada como as linhas de trem de Touzai e Yamanote durante a manhã.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 獎品？！聽了這話，面面相覷後，山羊們一齊朝門衝了過去，其出入口就如上班高峰期的電車般擠成了一團。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 奖品？！听了这话，面面相觑后，山羊们一齐朝门冲了过去，其出入口就如上班高峰期的电车般挤成了一团。

Umineko Project (UP): Each wanted to get out first, so none of them could get out.{n}......{f:5:Virgilia} held her head in frustration.
Steam (ST): Each wanted to get out first, so none of them could get out. ...{f:5:Virgilia} held her head in frustration.
PC Japanese (JP): 我先に出ようとするから誰も出られないのだ。……ワルギリアは、あーもう…と頭を抱える。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 我先に出ようとするから誰も出られないのだ。{n}……ワルギリアは、あーもう…と頭を抱える。
Russian (RU): Каждый хотел выбежать первым, из‐за чего выбраться не удавалось никому.{n}{f:5:Вергилия} в раздражении повесила голову.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Cada uma delas queria sair primeiro, e por isso nenhuma delas conseguia sair.{n}......{f:5:Virgilia} apoiou a cabeça com a mão, frustrada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 由於都在爭先恐後地出去，所以誰都出不來。{n}……瓦爾基莉亞說著“啊——真是的…”，抱住了頭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 由于都在争先恐后地出去，所以谁都出不来。{n}……瓦尔基莉亚说着“啊——真是的…”，抱住了头。

Umineko Project (UP): By that time, Kanon had managed to cut just enough bars to make a gap that could be slipped through.
Steam (ST): By that time, Kanon had managed to cut enough bars to make a crack that could be slipped through.
PC Japanese (JP): その頃、嘉音はどうにか隙間を抜けられる程度に、鉄格子を切断して隙間を作る。
Russian (RU): К этому времени Канон разрезал достаточно прутьев решётки, чтобы можно было протиснуться через неё.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nessa hora, Kanon já havia conseguido cortar barras o suficiente para que eles pudessem passar pelo buraco que se abriu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此時，嘉音已好歹是在鐵窗上切開了個大到能夠鑽出去的口子了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此时，嘉音已好歹是在铁窗上切开了个大到能够钻出去的口子了。

Umineko Project (UP): It proved a bit of work for Krauss, large as he was, and Nanjo, whose waist was nearly his downfall, but even so, they all managed to make it through.
Steam (ST): It had been a bit of work for Krauss, large as he was, and Nanjo, with his lethal waist, but even so, they all managed to make it through.
PC Japanese (JP): 大柄な蔵臼とウェストが致命的な南條がかなり苦労したが、それでも何とか全員抜けられた。
Russian (RU): Крауссу с его крупным телосложением и Нанджо с его раздающейся талией пришлось повозиться, однако им всё‐таки удалось миновать решётку.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Acabou sendo um pouco difícil para Krauss, por ser grande, e também para Nanjo, com sua grande cintura, mas no fim, eles conseguiram passar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然大個子的藏臼與腰圍過粗的南條是吃了不少苦頭，但最終總算是所有人都鑽了出來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然大个子的藏臼与腰围过粗的南条是吃了不少苦头，但最终总算是所有人都钻了出来。

Umineko Project (UP): But their relief at getting through was short‐lived.
Steam (ST): But after they did, they only had a couple seconds to be relieved.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、抜けてほっとしたのも束の間。
Russian (RU): Однако они испытали облегчение всего лишь на пару секунд.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, o alívio deles por terem passado durou pouco.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，鑽出來鬆了口氣的時間僅有一瞬。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，钻出来松了口气的时间仅有一瞬。

Umineko Project (UP): Immediately, another set of metal bars blocked the way in front of them.
Steam (ST): Immediately, another set of metal bars blocked the way in front of them.
PC Japanese (JP): すぐに同じような鉄格子が再び目の前を阻んでいる。
Russian (RU): Потому что перед ними моментально возникла ещё одна преграждающая путь металлическая решётка.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Imediatamente, outra grade com barras de metal bloqueou o caminho deles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 馬上就又看到了一道同樣的鐵窗擋在了眼前。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 马上就又看到了一道同样的铁窗挡在了眼前。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Umineko Project (UP): "The security sure is tough. ......I bet they really didn't want the people in here to escape."
Steam (ST): "This certainly is secure. ...I'll bet they really didn't want the people in here to escape."
PC Japanese (JP): 「厳重ね。……よっぽどここの人を逃がしたくなかったんでしょうね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「厳重ね。……よっぽどここの人を逃がしたくなかったんでしょうね」
Russian (RU): "Какая охрана. .......Похоже, они очень не хотят позволить людям сбежать отсюда."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "A segurança é mesmo pesada. ......Aposto que eles realmente não queriam ver pessoas escapando daqui."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「真森嚴呢。……是十分地不想讓身在此處之人逃走吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「真森严呢。……是十分地不想让身在此处之人逃走吧。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Umineko Project (UP): "Kanon, sorry, but I'll have to ask you again. ......I'm sure it's tough on you, but please...!"
Steam (ST): "Kanon, sorry, but I'll have to ask you again. ...It may be tough, but please...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「嘉音、すまんがもう一度頼む。……辛いだろうが、頼む…！」
Russian (RU): "Канон, прости, но мне придётся вновь попросить тебя о помощи. .....Тебе может прийтись нелегко, но пожалуйста!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Kanon, desculpe, mas vou ter que pedir a você de novo. ......Tenho certeza que é difícil, mas por favor...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嘉音，抱歉再拜託你一次。……是很辛苦吧，但拜託了…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嘉音，抱歉再拜托你一次。……是很辛苦吧，但拜托了…！」

Umineko Project (UP): There was sweat on Kanon's forehead.
Steam (ST): There was sweat on Kanon's forehead.
PC Japanese (JP): 嘉音の額には汗が浮かんでいる。
Russian (RU): Лоб Канон был в поту.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Havia suor na testa de Kanon.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 嘉音的額頭上浮著汗水。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 嘉音的额头上浮着汗水。

Umineko Project (UP): You could tell at a glance that cutting the metal bars, which had been made even more solid by magic, was exhausting him considerably.
Steam (ST): You could tell at a glance that cutting the metal bars, which had been made even more solid by magic, had physically exhausted him.
PC Japanese (JP): 魔法で堅牢さを増した鉄格子の切断に、かなりの体力消耗を強いられているのは一目でわかった。
Russian (RU): При одном взгляде на него становилось ясно, что резка усиленных магией металлических прутьев отняла у него много сил.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Só de olhar você já poderia dizer que cortar aquelas barras de metal, que eram ainda mais sólidas por causa da magia, estava deixando ele consideravelmente exausto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 一目了然，切割以魔法增強過的鐵窗，迫使他消耗了相當大的體力。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 一目了然，切割以魔法增强过的铁窗，迫使他消耗了相当大的体力。

Speaker: Kanon
Umineko Project (UP): "......Yes, leave it to me, Krauss‐sama."
Steam (ST): "...Yes, leave it to me, Krauss-sama."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……ハイ、お任せを旦那様。」
Russian (RU): ".....Да, предоставьте это мне, Краусс‐сама."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Sim, deixe comigo, patrão."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……是，包在我身上，主人。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Umineko Project (UP): "Only you can do it! Please, we're counting on you...!"
Steam (ST): "Only you can do it! Please, we're counting on you...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「お前にしか出来ん！　どうか頼む…！」
Russian (RU): "Лишь тебе одному это по силам! Мы рассчитываем на тебя!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Só você pode fazer isso! Por favor, estamos contanto com você...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「只有你做得到！千萬拜託了…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「只有你做得到！千万拜托了…！」

Umineko Project (UP): Only he...could do it. ......Holding tightly onto those words, Kanon concentrated his mind again and once more set himself to the task of cutting the bars.
Steam (ST): Only he...could do it. ...Holding tightly onto those words, Kanon concentrated his mind once again and set himself to the task of cutting metal bars again.
PC Japanese (JP): 自分にしか、出来ない。……その言葉を強く飲み込み、嘉音はもう一度、精神を集中して再び鉄格子の切断に臨む。
Russian (RU): Лишь ему одному... это по силам. Вцепившись в эти слова изо всех сил, Канон вновь мысленно сосредоточился и настроился на очередную резку прутьев решётки.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Apenas ele...podia fazer isso. ......Segurando‐se fortemente nesses palavras, Kanon concentrou sua mente novamente e preparou‐se para a tarefa de cortar as barras.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 只有自己，做得到。……深深領會了這句話後，嘉音又一次集中起精神，開始切割鐵窗。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 只有自己，做得到。……深深领会了这句话后，嘉音又一次集中起精神，开始切割铁窗。

Speaker: Shannon
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Enemies are coming from behind. Multiple."
Steam (ST): "......Enemies are coming from behind. Multiple targets."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………後方、敵が来ます。複数。」
Russian (RU): ".........Враги приближаются с тылов. Их много."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Inimigos estão vindo por trás. Múltiplos."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………後方有敵人來了。是複數。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………后方有敌人来了。是复数。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Umineko Project (UP): "Yes, this time, even we can tell. ......The ground's really shaking. I can tell that some terrible monsters are rushing at us."
Steam (ST): "Yeah, this time even we can tell. ...The ground's really shaking. I can tell that some ridiculous monsters are rushing at us."
PC Japanese (JP): 「えぇ、今度は私たちにもわかるわ。……すごい地響きね。とんでもないバケモノが殺到してくるのがわかるわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「えぇ、今度は私たちにもわかるわ。……すごい地響きね。とんでもないバケモノが殺到してくるのがわかるわ」
Russian (RU): "Ага, на этот раз даже я ощущаю. .....Земля сотрясается. К нам в спешке приближаются какие‐то нелепые монстры."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, dessa vez, até eu posso afirmar. ......O chão está realmente tremendo. Consigo dizer que algum tipo de monstro terrível está correndo na nossa direção."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯，這次我們也明白。……地面震得好厲害。可想而知，是有了不得的怪物殺來了呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯，这次我们也明白。……地面震得好厉害。可想而知，是有了不得的怪物杀来了呢。」

Speaker: Shannon
Umineko Project (UP): "Don't worry. I'll seal the bars we just came through with a magic lock. Goats won't be able to break it."
Steam (ST): "Don't worry. I'll use a magic lock to make a blockade of the metal bars we just came through. Mere goats won't be able to break it."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ご安心を。今抜けた鉄格子を、私が魔法錠で封鎖します。山羊たち如きには破れません。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ご安心を。今抜けた鉄格子を、私が魔法錠で封鎖します。山羊たち如きには破れません」
Russian (RU): "Не волнуйся. Я сделаю баррикаду при помощи магического замка из металлических прутьев, которые мы недавно миновали. Козлоголовым её не сломать."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não se preocupe. Eu irei selar as grades que passamos com uma fechadura mágica. As cabras não serão capazes de quebrá‐la."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「請放心。我這就用魔法鎖封鎖剛才我們鑽過的鐵窗。區區山羊，是突破不了的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「请放心。我这就用魔法锁封锁刚才我们钻过的铁窗。区区山羊，是突破不了的。」

Umineko Project (UP): Shannon held her hand out towards the bars they had come through.
Steam (ST): Shannon held her hand out towards the metal bars they had gone through.
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音は抜けてきた鉄格子に手をかざす。
Russian (RU): Шаннон вытянула руки к металлическим прутьям, через которые они пробрались.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Shannon estendeu sua mão para frente, na direção de onde eles haviam passado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 紗音朝剛才那鐵窗伸出了手去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 纱音朝刚才那铁窗伸出了手去。

Umineko Project (UP): ......But she stopped right away.
Steam (ST): ...But she stopped right away.
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかし、すぐにそれを止めた。
Russian (RU): Но тут она остановилась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Mas ela parou no mesmo instante.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……可是，她馬上就停手了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……可是，她马上就停手了。

Speaker: Nanjo Terumasa
Umineko Project (UP): "Wh‐what is it...?"
Steam (ST): "Wh-What is it...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ど、どうしましたか…。」
Russian (RU): "Ч‐что случилось?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "O‐O que foi...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「怎、怎麼了…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「怎、怎么了…？」

Speaker: Shannon
Umineko Project (UP): "{f:5:Virgilia}‐sama has started neutralizing the spirit wave jamming... It'll be bad if it's broken—we'll lose the initiative once the Chiester Sisters are rebooted...!"
Steam (ST): "{f:5:Virgilia}-sama has started neutralizing the Spirit Wave Jamming... It'll be bad if it's broken, and we'll lose the initiative once the Chiester Sisters are rebooted...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ワルギリアさまが、霊波妨害の中和を開始…。破られるとまずい、シエスタ姉妹の再起動後のイニシアチブを奪われます…！」
Russian (RU): "{f:5:Вергилия}‐сама начала нейтрализацию Глушения духовной волной... Нам придётся очень несладко, если от нашего глушения избавятся, вдобавок, мы потеряем инициативу, как только сёстры Чиесты перезагрузятся!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "A {f:5:Virgilia}‐sama começou a neutralizar a interferência da onda espiritual... Será um problema se for quebrada — perderemos a iniciativa uma vez que as Irmãs Chiester reiniciem...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「瓦爾基莉亞夫人開始中和靈波干擾了…。被破了就糟糕了，會被剝奪謝絲塔姐妹重啟後的主導權…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「瓦尔基莉亚夫人开始中和灵波干扰了…。被破了就糟糕了，会被剥夺谢丝塔姐妹重启后的主导权…！」

Speaker: {f:5:Virgilia}

Umineko Project (UP): "I don't have a clue what you're saying, but—"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「虽然完全搞不懂你们在说啥，」

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 霧江は、さっき嘉音が切断した鉄格子を拾い上げる。{n}蔵臼に武器はないが握り拳を揉んで、二人は地響きの迫ってくる地下道の奥を睨む。

Chinese Simplified (CN): 接着，在黑暗彼方传来了野兽们的震耳咆哮，浮现出了一对对闪耀着凶光的血红的眼睛。

Steam (ST): Goats that were several levels more massive than the guards were rushing with an incredible force.

PC Japanese (JP): 彼らの立てる地響きはまるで地震。それは凄まじい迫力と恐怖だが、むしろ霧江は安堵に笑う。……その巨体では鉄格子の隙間は抜けられない！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 彼らの立てる地響きはまるで地震。{n}それは凄まじい迫力と恐怖だが、むしろ霧江は安堵に笑う。{n}……その巨体では鉄格子の隙間は抜けられない！
Russian (RU): Вызываемые ими толчки почти напоминали землетрясение.{n}Страх сжимал в тисках, но вместо паники Кирие с облегчением рассмеялась.{n}Эти массивные тела не смогут миновать проем между прутьями!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os tremores que elas criavam eram quase como terremotos.{n}O poder e terror eram tremendos, mas Kyrie riu com alívio.{n}......Esses corpos gigantes não vão conseguir passar pelo buraco na grade!

Umineko Project (UP): The group of goats crashed into the metal bars with a terrific sound like that of a train colliding with a dead end.
Steam (ST): The group of goats crashed into the metal bars with a fierce sound like that of a train colliding with a dead end.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O grupo de cabras colidiu nas barras de metal, fazendo um som violento, como um trem colidindo com o fim da linha.
